Posts.Content: Well i have no answers really. The consultant had a feel and said there was definitely a lump and some thickening of breast tissue which he wanted a mammogram of straight away. He said then you will come back on monday and have an ultra sound and probably a biopsy. I had the mammogram then the nurse said my ultrasound woukd be on monday 11th march! I said but the consultant said it would be this monday coming.She said im sorry but that clinic is already full and you cant come to the other clinics as you will need a biopsy and they only happen on a monday when the consultant is there. She said im so sorry we are working on this being a one stop clinic but at the moment you have to come back for ultrasounds and biopsies. Im beside myself i cant wait that long. I feel numb.
Posts.Title: Appointment tomorrow

Posts.Content: Thank you Ann I think it will just be cystic but its just the waiting isnt it and they probably wont tell me then either will they? I will keep busy like you say. I dont work every day but will find other things to do. Thanks again. Hope you are ok? Xx Touche
Posts.Title: Appointment tomorrow

Posts.Content: I have my appt at the breast clinic tomorrow and im feeling very anxious. Will.they be able to tell me the same day if it is cancer or will i have to wait?
Posts.Title: Appointment tomorrow

Posts.Content: Thank you Sal, Lucky Pants made me smile . Im sure it will be fine! Working this morning so hopefully that will take my mind off it. Thanks for being there in spirit, it means a lot. Touche xx
Posts.Title: Appointment tomorrow

Posts.Content: Thank you Ann, fingers crossed it will be a cyst. Feel better knowing you are thinking of me xx
